pli-tv-pvr2.2:0.4.eng: The number of offenses within each offense

pli-tv-pvr2.2:0.5.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing expulsion

pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.1.pli: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.1.eng: When a lustful nun consents to a lustful man making physical contact with her, how many kinds of offenses does she commit?

pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.2.pli: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.2.eng: She commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.3.pli: Adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.3.eng: when she consents to him taking hold of her anywhere below the collar bone but above the knees, she commits an offense entailing expulsion;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.4.pli: ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.4.eng: when she consents to him taking hold of her above the collar bone or below the knees, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.5.eng: when she consents to him taking hold of something connected to her body, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:1.6.pli: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.1.pli: Vajjappaṭicchādikā bhikkhunī vajjaṃ paṭicchādentī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.1.eng: When a nun conceals an offense, how many kinds of offenses does she commit?

pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.2.pli: Vajjappaṭicchādikā bhikkhunī vajjaṃ paṭicchādentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.2.eng: She commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.3.pli: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicchādeti, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.3.eng: when she knowingly conceals an offense entailing expulsion, she commits an offense entailing expulsion;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.4.eng: when, being unsure, she conceals it, she commits a serious offense;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.4.comm: This ruling does not seem to be found in the Canonical text, either for monks or nuns.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.5.eng: when she conceals a failure in conduct, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:2.6.pli: vajjappaṭicchādikā bhikkhunī vajjaṃ paṭicchādentī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.1.pli: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.1.eng: When a nun takes sides with one who has been ejected and does not stop when pressed for the third time, how many kinds of offenses does she commit?

pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.2.pli: Ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.2.eng: She commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.3.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.4.eng: after each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.5.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing expulsion.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:3.6.pli: ukkhittānuvattikā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.1.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.1.eng: When fulfilling the eight parts, how many kinds of offenses does she commit?

pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.2.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.2.eng: She commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.3.pli: Purisena—“itthannāmaṃ okāsaṃ āgacchā”ti vuttā gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.3.eng: when she goes to such-and-such a place when told by a man to do so, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.4.eng: when she enters within arm’s reach of the man, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.5.eng: when she fulfills the eight parts, she commits an offense entailing expulsion.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:4.6.pli: aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:5.1.eng: The offenses entailing expulsion are finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:6.0.eng: 2. The chapter on offenses entailing suspension

pli-tv-pvr2.2:6.1.pli: Ussayavādikā bhikkhunī aḍḍaṃ karontī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:6.1.eng: When a litigious nun initiates a lawsuit, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:6.2.eng: when she tells one other person, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:6.3.eng: when she tells a second person, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:6.4.eng: when the lawsuit is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:7.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a female criminal, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:7.2.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:7.3.eng: after each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:7.4.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:8.1.pli: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:8.1.eng: When walking to the next inhabited area by herself, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:8.2.eng: when she is in the process of going, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:8.3.pli: paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:8.3.eng: when she crosses the boundary with her first foot, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:8.4.eng: when she crosses with her second foot, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:9.1.pli: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṃ osārentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:9.1.eng: When readmitting a nun who had been ejected by a unanimous Sangha in accordance with the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Teacher’s instruction, without first getting permission from the Sangha that did the legal procedure and without the consent of the community, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:9.2.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:9.3.eng: after each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:9.4.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:10.1.pli: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:10.1.eng: When a lustful nun eats fresh or cooked food after receiving it directly from a lustful man, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:10.2.eng: when she receives fresh or cooked food with the intention of eating it, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:10.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing suspension;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:10.4.eng: if she receives water or a tooth cleaner, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:11.1.pli: “Kiṃ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṃ anavassutā. Iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā, taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojentī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:11.1.eng: When urging a nun on, saying, “Venerable, what can this man do to you, whether he has lust or not, if you’re without? Go on, venerable, receive it with your own hands and then eat whatever fresh or cooked food he gives you,” she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:11.2.pli: Tassā vacanena khādissāmi bhuñjissāmīti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:11.2.eng: when, because of her statement, the other nun receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:11.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:11.4.eng: when the meal is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:12.1.pli: Kupitā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:12.1.eng: When an angry nun does not stop when pressed for the third time, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:12.2.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:12.3.eng: after each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:12.4.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:13.1.pli: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:13.1.eng: When a nun who has lost a legal case does not stop when pressed for the third time, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:13.2.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:13.3.eng: after each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:13.4.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:14.1.pli: Saṃsaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyo tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:14.1.eng: When socializing nuns do not stop when pressed for the third time, they commit three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:14.2.eng: after the motion, they commit an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:14.3.eng: after each of the first two announcements, they commit a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:14.4.eng: when the last announcement is finished, they commit an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:15.1.pli: “Saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:15.1.eng: When urging the nuns on, saying, “Venerables, you should socialize. Don’t live separately,” and not stopping when pressed for the third time, she commits three kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:15.2.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:15.3.eng: after each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:15.4.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:16.1.eng: The offenses entailing suspension are finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:17.1.eng: When collecting almsbowls, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:17.2.eng: an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:18.1.pli: Akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvaran”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:18.1.eng: When determining out-of-season robe-cloth as “in-season”, and then distributing it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:18.2.eng: when she is in the process of distributing it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:18.3.eng: when she has distributed it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:19.1.pli: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:19.1.eng: When trading robes with a nun and then taking it back, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:19.2.eng: when she is in the process of taking it back, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:19.3.eng: when she has taken it back, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:20.1.pli: Aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:20.1.eng: When asking for one thing and then for something else, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:20.2.eng: when she is in the process of asking, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:20.3.eng: when she has asked, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:21.1.pli: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:21.1.eng: When getting one thing in exchange and then something else, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:21.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:21.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:22.1.pli: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:22.1.eng: When exchanging for something else a requisite belonging to the Sangha that is designated for a specific purpose, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:22.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:22.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:23.1.pli: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena saṃyācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:23.1.eng: When exchanging for something else a requisite belonging to the Sangha that is designated for a specific purpose and was asked for, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:23.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:23.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:24.1.pli: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:24.1.eng: When exchanging for something else a collective requisite that is designated for a specific purpose, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:24.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:24.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:25.1.pli: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saṃyācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:25.1.eng: When exchanging for something else a collective requisite that is designated for a specific purpose and was asked for, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:25.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:25.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:26.1.pli: Aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saṃyācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:26.1.eng: When exchanging for something else a personal requisite that is designated for a specific purpose and was asked for, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:26.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:26.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:27.1.pli: Atirekacatukkaṃsaparamaṃ garupāvuraṇaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:27.1.eng: When getting in exchange a heavy cloak worth more than four kaṁsa coins, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:27.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:27.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:28.1.pli: Atirekaaḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ lahupāvuraṇaṃ cetāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:28.1.eng: When getting in exchange a light cloak worth more than two-and-a-half kaṁsa coins, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:28.2.eng: when she is in the process of getting it in exchange, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:28.3.eng: when she has received it in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:29.1.eng: The rules on relinquishment and confession are finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:30.0.1.eng: 4. The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-pvr2.2:30.1.eng: When eating garlic, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:30.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:30.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:31.1.pli: Sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:31.1.eng: When removing hair from the private parts, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:31.2.eng: when she is in the process of removing it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:31.3.eng: when she has removed it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:32.1.eng: When slapping her genitals with the palm of her hand, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:32.2.eng: when she is in the process of slapping, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:32.3.eng: when she is done, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:33.1.eng: When using a dildo, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:33.2.eng: when she is using it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:33.3.eng: when she is done, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:34.1.pli: Atirekadvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:34.1.eng: When cleaning herself with water by inserting more than two finger joints, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:34.2.eng: when she is in the process of cleaning, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:34.3.eng: when she is done, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:35.1.pli: Bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:35.1.eng: When attending on a monk who is eating with drinking water or a fan, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:35.2.eng: when standing within arm’s reach, she commits an offense entailing confession;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:35.3.eng: when standing beyond arm’s reach, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:36.1.pli: Āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:36.1.eng: When asking for raw grain and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:36.2.eng: when she receives with the intention to eat, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:36.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:37.1.pli: Uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:37.1.eng: When disposing of feces, urine, trash, or food scraps over a wall or over an encircling wall, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:37.2.eng: when she is in the process of discarding it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:37.3.eng: when she has discarded it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:38.1.pli: Uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:38.1.eng: When disposing of feces, urine, trash, or food scraps on cultivated plants, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:38.2.eng: when she is in the process of discarding it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:38.3.eng: when she has discarded it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:39.1.pli: Naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:39.1.eng: When going to see dancing, singing, or music, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:39.2.eng: when she is in the process of going, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:39.3.pli: yattha ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:39.3.eng: wherever she stands to see it or hear it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:40.1.eng: The first subchapter on garlic is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:41.0.eng: The subchapter on the dark of the night

pli-tv-pvr2.2:41.1.pli: Rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:41.1.eng: When standing alone with a man in the dark of the night without a lamp, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:41.2.eng: when she stands within arm’s reach, she commits an offense entailing confession;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:41.3.eng: when she stands beyond arm’s reach, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:42.1.pli: Paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:42.1.eng: When standing alone with a man in a concealed place, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:42.2.eng: when she stands within arm’s reach, she commits an offense entailing confession;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:42.3.eng: when she stands beyond arm’s reach, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:43.1.pli: Ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:43.1.eng: When standing alone with a man out in the open, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:43.2.eng: when she stands within arm’s reach, she commits an offense entailing confession;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:43.3.eng: when she stands beyond arm’s reach, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:44.1.pli: Rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:44.1.eng: When standing alone with a man on a street, in a cul-de-sac, or at an intersection, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:44.2.eng: when she stands within arm’s reach, she commits an offense entailing confession;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:44.3.eng: when she stands beyond arm’s reach, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:45.1.pli: Purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:45.1.eng: When visiting families before the meal, sitting down on a seat, and then departing without informing the owners, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:45.2.pli: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ anovassakaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:45.2.eng: when she goes beyond the roof cover of the house with the first foot, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:45.3.eng: when she goes beyond with the second foot, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:46.1.pli: Pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:46.1.eng: When visiting families after the meal and then sitting down on a seat without asking permission of the owners, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:46.2.eng: when she is in the process of sitting down, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:46.3.eng: when she is seated, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:47.1.pli: Vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:47.1.eng: When visiting families at the wrong time, putting out bedding without asking permission of the owners, or having it put out, and then sitting down, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:47.2.eng: when she is in the process of sitting down, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:47.3.eng: when she is seated, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:48.1.pli: Duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:48.1.eng: When complaining about someone because of a misunderstanding and a lack of proper reflection, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:48.2.eng: when she is in the process of complaining, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:48.3.eng: when she has complained, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:49.1.pli: Attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:49.1.eng: When referring to hell or the spiritual life to curse oneself or someone else, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:49.2.eng: when she is in the process of cursing, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:49.3.eng: when she has finished cursing, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:50.1.pli: Attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:50.1.eng: When crying after repeatedly beating herself, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:50.2.eng: when beating herself and crying, she commits an offense entailing confession;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:50.3.eng: when beating herself but not crying, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:51.1.eng: The second subchapter on the dark of the night is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:52.1.eng: When bathing naked, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:52.2.eng: when she is bathing, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:52.3.eng: when she is finished bathing, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:53.1.pli: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ udakasāṭikaṃ kārāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:53.1.eng: When making a bathing robe that exceeds the right size, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:53.2.eng: when she is in the process of making it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:53.3.eng: when she has made it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:54.1.pli: Bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentī na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:54.1.eng: When unstitching a nun’s robe, or having it unstitched, and then neither sewing it herself nor making any effort to have someone else sew it, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:55.1.pli: Pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:55.1.eng: When not moving her robes for more than five days, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:56.1.eng: When wearing a  robe taken on loan, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:56.2.eng: when she is wearing it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:56.3.eng: when she has worn it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:57.1.pli: Gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ karontī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:57.1.eng: When creating an obstacle for the community to get robe-cloth, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:57.2.eng: when she is in the process of creating it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:57.3.eng: when she has created it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:58.1.pli: Dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:58.1.eng: When blocking a legitimate distribution of robe-cloth, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:58.2.eng: when she is in the process of blocking it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:58.3.eng: when she has blocked it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:59.1.pli: Agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:59.1.eng: When giving a monastic robe to a householder, a male wanderer, or a female wanderer, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:59.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:59.3.eng: when she has given it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:60.1.pli: Dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:60.1.eng: When letting the robe season expire because of an uncertain expectation of robe-cloth, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:60.2.eng: when she is in the process of letting it expire, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:60.3.eng: when she has let it expire, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:61.1.pli: Dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:61.1.eng: When blocking a legitimate ending of the robe season, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:61.2.eng: when she is in the process of blocking it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:61.3.eng: when she has blocked it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:62.1.eng: The third subchapter on bathing is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:63.1.pli: Dve bhikkhuniyo ekamañce tuvaṭṭentiyo dve āpattiyo āpajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:63.1.eng: When two nuns lie down on the same bed, they commit two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:63.2.eng: when they are in the process of lying down, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:63.3.eng: when they are lying down, they commit an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:64.1.pli: Dve bhikkhuniyo ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭentiyo dve āpattiyo āpajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:64.1.eng: When two nuns lie down on the same sheet and under the same cover, they commit two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:64.2.eng: when they are in the process of lying down, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:64.3.eng: when they are lying down, they commit an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:65.1.pli: Bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ karontī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:65.1.eng: When intentionally making a nun ill at ease, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:65.2.eng: when she is doing it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:65.3.eng: when she has done it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:66.1.pli: Dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhentī na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:66.1.eng: When not nursing a suffering disciple, nor making any effort to have someone nurse her, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:67.1.pli: Bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:67.1.eng: When giving a dwelling place to a nun, and then, in anger, throwing her out, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:67.2.eng: when she is in the process of throwing her out, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:67.3.eng: when she has thrown her out, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:68.1.pli: Saṃsaṭṭhā bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:68.1.eng: When a socializing nun does not stop when pressed for the third time, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:68.2.eng: after the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:68.3.eng: when the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:69.1.pli: Antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:69.1.eng: When wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered risky and dangerous within her own country, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:69.2.eng: when she is traveling, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:69.3.eng: when she has traveled, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:70.1.pli: Tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ carantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:70.1.eng: When wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered risky and dangerous outside her own country, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:70.2.eng: when she is traveling, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:70.3.eng: when she has traveled, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:71.1.pli: Antovassaṃ cārikaṃ carantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:71.1.eng: When wandering during the rainy season, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:71.2.eng: when she is traveling, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:71.3.eng: when she has traveled, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:72.1.pli: Vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhunī cārikaṃ na pakkamantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:72.1.eng: When a nun who has completed the rainy-season residence does not go wandering, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:73.1.eng: The fourth subchapter on lying down is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:74.1.pli: Rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gacchantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:74.1.eng: When visiting a royal house, a gallery, a park, a garden, or a lotus pond, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:74.2.eng: when she is in the process of going there, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:74.3.eng: wherever she stands to see them, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:75.1.pli: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:75.1.eng: When using a high or luxurious couch, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:75.2.eng: when she is using it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:75.3.eng: when she has used it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:76.1.eng: When spinning yarn, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:76.2.eng: when she is spinning, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:76.3.eng: for every pull, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:77.1.eng: When providing services for a householder, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:77.2.eng: when she is in the process of providing them, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:77.3.eng: when she has provided them, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:78.1.pli: Bhikkhuniyā—“ehāyye, imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī”ti vuccamānā—“sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā neva vūpasamentī na vūpasamāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:78.1.eng: When agreeing, when requested by a nun, to resolve a legal issue, but then neither resolving it nor making any effort to resolve it, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:79.1.pli: Agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:79.1.eng: When personally giving fresh or cooked food to a householder, a male wanderer, or a female wanderer, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:79.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:79.3.eng: when she has given, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:80.1.pli: Āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:80.1.eng: When not relinquishing but continuing to use a communal robe, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:80.2.eng: when she is using it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:80.3.eng: when she has used it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:81.1.pli: Āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:81.1.eng: When going wandering without relinquishing her lodging, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:81.2.pli: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:81.2.eng: when she crosses the boundary with her first foot, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:81.3.eng: when she crosses with her second foot, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:82.1.eng: When studying worldly subjects, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:82.2.eng: when she is studying, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:82.3.eng: for every line, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:83.1.eng: When teaching worldly subjects, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:83.2.eng: when she is teaching, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:83.3.eng: for every line, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:84.1.eng: The fifth subchapter on galleries is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:85.1.pli: Jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā pavisantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:85.1.eng: When entering a monastery without asking permission, yet knowing that there are monks there, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:85.2.pli: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:85.2.eng: when she crosses the boundary with her first foot, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:85.3.eng: when she crosses with her second foot, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:86.1.pli: Bhikkhuṃ akkosantī paribhāsantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:86.1.eng: When abusing or reviling a monk, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:86.2.eng: when she is in the process of abusing, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:86.3.eng: when she is finished abusing, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:87.1.pli: Caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāsantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:87.1.eng: When furiously reviling the community, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:87.2.eng: when she is in the process of reviling, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:87.3.eng: when she is finished reviling, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:88.1.pli: Nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:88.1.eng: When invited to a meal, refusing an offer to eat more, and then eating fresh or cooked food, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:88.2.eng: when receiving with the intention to eat, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:88.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:89.1.eng: When keeping a family to herself, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:89.2.eng: when she is in the process of keeping it for herself, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:89.3.eng: when she has kept it for herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:90.1.pli: Abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:90.1.eng: When spending the rainy-season residence in a monastery without monks, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:90.2.pli: “Vassaṃ vasissāmī”ti senāsanaṃ paññapeti pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapeti pariveṇaṃ sammajjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:90.2.eng: when she thinks, “I’ll stay here for the rainy-season residence,” and she prepares a dwelling, sets out water for drinking and water for washing, and sweeps the yard, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:90.3.eng: at dawn, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:91.1.pli: Vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhunī ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:91.1.eng: When a nun who has completed the rainy-season residence does not invite correction from both Sanghas in regard to three things, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:92.1.pli: Ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gacchantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:92.1.eng: When not going to the instruction or to a formal meeting of the community, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:93.1.pli: Uposathampi na pucchantī ovādampi na yācantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:93.1.eng: When not enquiring about the observance day nor asking for the instruction, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:94.1.pli: Pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:94.1.eng: When being alone with a man and having him rupture an abscess or a wound situated on the lower part of her body, without getting permission from the Sangha or a group, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:94.2.eng: when she is in the process of having it ruptured, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:94.3.eng: when she has had it ruptured, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:95.1.eng: The sixth subchapter on monasteries is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:96.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a pregnant woman, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:96.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:96.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:97.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a woman who is breastfeeding, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:97.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:97.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:98.1.pli: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:98.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a trainee nun who has not trained for two years in the six rules, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:98.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:98.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:99.1.pli: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:99.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a trainee nun who has trained for two years in the six rules, but who has not been approved by the Sangha, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:99.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:99.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:100.1.pli: Ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:100.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a married girl who is less than twelve years old, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:100.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:100.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:101.1.pli: Paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:101.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a married girl who is more than twelve years old, but who has not trained for two years in the six rules, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:101.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:101.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:102.1.pli: Paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:102.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a married girl who is more than twelve years old and who has trained for two years in the six rules, but who has not been approved by the Sangha, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:102.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:102.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:103.1.pli: Sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇhantī nānuggaṇhāpentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:103.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a disciple, and then, for the next two years, neither guiding her nor having her guided, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:104.1.pli: Vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandhantī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:104.1.eng: When not following the mentor who gave her the full admission for two years, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:105.1.pli: Sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāsentī na vūpakāsāpentī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:105.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a disciple, and then neither sending her away nor having her sent away, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:106.1.eng: The seventh subchapter on pregnant women is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:107.1.pli: Ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:107.1.eng: When giving the full admission to an unmarried woman who is less than twenty years old, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:107.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:107.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:108.1.pli: Paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:108.1.eng: When giving the full admission to an unmarried woman who is more than twenty years old, but who has not trained for two years in the six rules, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:108.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:108.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:109.1.pli: Paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:109.1.eng: When giving the full admission to an unmarried woman who is more than twenty years old and who has trained for two years in the six rules, but who has not been approved by the Sangha, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:109.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:109.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:110.1.eng: When one who has less than twelve years of seniority gives the full admission, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:110.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:110.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:111.1.pli: Paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:111.1.eng: When one who has twelve years of seniority gives the full admission without approval from the Sangha, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:111.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:111.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:112.1.pli: “Alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti vuccamānā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:112.1.eng: When verbally consenting when being told, “Venerable, you’ve given enough full admissions for now,” but then criticizing it afterwards, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:112.2.eng: when she is criticizing, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:112.3.eng: when she has criticized, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:113.1.pli: Sikkhamānaṃ—“sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā neva vuṭṭhāpentī na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:113.1.eng: When telling a trainee nun, “If you give me a robe, venerable, I’ll give you the full admission,” but then neither giving her the full admission nor making any effort to have her fully admitted, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:114.1.pli: Sikkhamānaṃ—“sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā neva vuṭṭhāpentī na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karontī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:114.1.eng: When telling a trainee nun, “If you follow me for two years, venerable, I’ll give you the full admission,” but then neither giving her the full admission nor making any effort to have her fully admitted, she commits one kind of offense:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:115.1.pli: Purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:115.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a trainee nun who is socializing with men and boys and who is temperamental and difficult to live with, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:115.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:115.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:116.1.pli: Mātāpitūhi vā sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:116.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a trainee nun who has not been given permission by her parents or her husband, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:116.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:116.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:117.1.pli: Pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:117.1.eng: When giving the full admission to a trainee nun after a given consent has expired, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:117.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:117.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:118.1.eng: When giving full admission every year, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:118.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:118.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:119.1.pli: Ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:119.1.eng: When giving the full admission to two women in the same year, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:119.2.eng: when she is in the process of giving the full admission, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:119.3.eng: when she has given the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:120.1.eng: The eighth subchapter on unmarried women is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:121.0.eng: The subchapter on sunshades and sandals

pli-tv-pvr2.2:121.1.eng: When using a sunshade and sandals, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:121.2.eng: when she is using them, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:121.3.eng: when she has used them, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:122.1.eng: When traveling in a vehicle, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:122.2.eng: when she is traveling, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:122.3.eng: when she has traveled, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:123.1.eng: When wearing a hip ornament, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:123.2.eng: when she is wearing it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:123.3.eng: when she has worn it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:124.1.eng: When wearing jewelry, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:124.2.eng: when she is wearing it, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:124.3.eng: when she has worn it, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:125.1.eng: When bathing with scents and colors, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:125.2.eng: when she is bathing, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:125.3.eng: when she has bathed, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:126.1.pli: Vāsitakena piññākena nahāyantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:126.1.eng: When bathing with scented sesame paste, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:126.2.eng: when she is bathing, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:126.3.eng: when she has bathed, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:127.1.pli: Bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentī parimaddāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:127.1.eng: When having a nun massage or rub her, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:127.2.eng: when she is getting massaged, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:127.3.eng: when she has gotten massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:128.1.pli: Sikkhamānāya ummaddāpentī parimaddāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:128.1.eng: When having a trainee nun massage or rub her, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:128.2.eng: when she is getting massaged, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:128.3.eng: when she has gotten massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:129.1.pli: Sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpentī parimaddāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:129.1.eng: When having a novice nun massage or rub her, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:129.2.eng: when she is getting massaged, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:129.3.eng: when she has gotten massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:130.1.pli: Gihiniyā ummaddāpentī parimaddāpentī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:130.1.eng: When having a female householder massage or rub her, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:130.2.eng: when she is getting massaged, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:130.3.eng: when she has gotten massaged, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:131.1.pli: Bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:131.1.eng: When sitting down on a seat in front of a monk without asking permission, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:131.2.eng: when she is in the process of sitting down, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:131.3.eng: when she is seated, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:132.1.pli: Anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:132.1.eng: When asking a question of a monk who has not given her permission, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:132.2.eng: when she is asking, then for the effort there is an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:132.3.eng: when she has asked, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:133.1.pli: Asaṅkaccikā gāmaṃ pavisantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:133.1.eng: When entering an inhabited area without wearing her chest wrap, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:133.2.pli: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.2:133.2.eng: when she crosses the boundary with her first foot, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:133.3.eng: when she crosses with her second foot, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:134.1.eng: The ninth subchapter on sunshades and sandals is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:134.2.eng: The section on minor rules is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:135.0.eng: 5. The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment

pli-tv-pvr2.2:135.1.pli: Sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:135.1.eng: When asking for ghee and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:135.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:135.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:136.1.pli: Telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:136.1.eng: When asking for oil and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:136.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:136.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:137.1.pli: Madhuṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:137.1.eng: When asking for honey and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:137.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:137.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:138.1.pli: Phāṇitaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:138.1.eng: When asking for syrup and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:138.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:138.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:139.1.pli: Macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:139.1.eng: When asking for fish and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:139.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:139.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:140.1.pli: Maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:140.1.eng: When asking for meat and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:140.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:140.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:141.1.pli: Khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:141.1.eng: When asking for milk and then drinking it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:141.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of drinking it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:141.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:142.1.pli: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.2:142.1.eng: When asking for curd and then eating it, she commits two kinds of offenses:

pli-tv-pvr2.2:142.2.eng: when she receives it with the intention of eating it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct;

pli-tv-pvr2.2:142.3.eng: for every mouthful swallowed, she commits an offense entailing acknowledgment.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:143.1.eng: The eight offenses entailing acknowledgment are finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.2:143.2.eng: The number of offenses within each offense, the second, is finished.
